text:
Dearing is a city in Montgomery County, Kansas, United States. As of the 2010 census, 431 people lived there.
History.
The first post office in Dearing was created in January 1888. The city was incorporated in 1909.
Geography.
Dearing is at (37.058083, -95.709824). According to the United States Census Bureau, the city has a total area of. All of it is land.
2010 census.
As of the census of 2010, there were 431 people, 187 households, and 124 families living in the city.
